entry.title: Snow Plus Pod Pack - Love Pink

Type: Snow Plus

entry.title: Snow Plus Pre-Filled Pod Device
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Snow Plus
Price: 14.99

Snow Plus is a Canadian device manufacture that provides a innovative disposable pod system. Snow Plus is a light and modern design that fits comfortably in your pocket and delivers a smooth and satisfying vape experience.  The vape has a 400mAh battery that is big enough to keep you satisfied all day with one vape charge. 

The pod systems are easy to use with an average of 300 puffs per pod. The interchangeable system makes it easy to swap out the pods with no hassle. 

Includes:

  • Snow Plus Device 
  • Universal USB Charging Cable 
  • User manual

entry.title: Snow Plus BoldSalt Pod Pack - The Root
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Snow Plus
Price: 14.99

Containing a capacity of 2.0 mL per pod, it follows BC Compliance laws and can put out 300 Puffs! On top of that, we've devised a proprietary nicotine blend called Bold Salts for our Snow Plus partners that combines our Freebase and NicSalts that provides a consistent flavorful experience with every vape. 

From day one, our main objective was to create a flavor that not only tasted like what its supposed to, but that truly captured the full-bodied experience that your favorite Rooty drink provides.

  1. First, we built the rooty base of the flavor by carefully selecting and balancing spices and unique earth tones in minute amounts.
  2. Then, we endeavored to replicate the sweet syrupy goodness of the flavor.
  3. Once we got that just right, it was time to blend these two flavor profiles together! We took the rootiness and the sweetness (which we referred to as dark and light) and combined them. This last phase took the longest because we wanted to ensure we achieved the perfect balance between light and dark.

The result is a beautifully balanced flavor that preserves the earthy authenticity of the flavor yet is also enjoyable to vape all-day-long. And yes, we're pretty proud of it!

Unlike many other rooty flavours, The Root is not creamy at all. We were going for a straight up flavor we know you will love. 

These pods are designed for the Snow Plus device as found here:

https://www.vangovapes.com/products/snow-plus-device

entry.title: Snow Plus BoldSalt Pod Pack - Cactus Jango
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: Snow Plus
Price: 14.99

Containing a capacity of 2.0 mL per pod, it follows BC Compliance laws and can put out 300 Puffs! On top of that, we've devised a proprietary nicotine blend called Bold Salts for our Snow Plus partners that combines our Freebase and NicSalts that provides a consistent flavorful experience with every vape. 

Now, the flavor. Cactus Jango is one of VanGo Vapes crown jewels. Released in 2017, it came out of a challenge to stand up and be a fruit flavored vape like no other. Containing unique fruits like Jackfruit, Lychee and Cactus with popping flavors like Strawberry and Mango, it is an amazingly juicy flavor!
